title: How Lewis Hamilton got his 7th world title
description: Lewis Hamilton rose above and beyond the rest as he clinches his 7th world championship title matching Schumacher’s record and the team look at the rest of the podium which saw Sergio Perez and Sebastian Vettel take to the stage.
itunes:title: How Lewis Hamilton got his 7th world title
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: Lewis Hamilton rose above and beyond the rest as he clinches his 7th world championship title matching Schumacher’s record and the team look at the rest of the podium which saw Sergio Perez and Sebastian Vettel take to the stage.
